entry.def: A seahorse is a type of small fish which appears to swim in a vertical position and whose head looks a little like the head of a horse.

means.word_mean: 1. either of two large northern marine mammals having ivory tusks and tough hide over thick blubber
2. small fish with horselike heads bent sharply downward and curled tails; swim in upright position
